doc.title: The Great Indian Comedy Show
doc.plot: The Show always opens with a mini opening gag setting the mood, which leads on to the montage and the sets where the host of the day takes you through his stand up monologue. The opening host routine is made of one-liners on current events from the world of politics, sports, slices of Indian life and of course, sports. The show has three segments and four sketches and three separate stand up segments.
